soot.toDex

Class DexPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.toDex.DexPrinter

  • public class DexPrinter
extends java.lang.Object
    Main entry point for the "dex" output format.

    Use add(SootClass) to add classes that should be printed as dex output and print() to finally print the classes.
    If the printer has found the original APK of an added class (via SourceLocator.dexClassIndex()), the files in the APK are copied to a new one, replacing it's classes.dex and excluding the signature files. Note that you have to sign and align the APK yourself, with jarsigner and zipalign, respectively.
    If there is no original APK, the printer just emits a classes.dex.
    See Also:
    jarsigner documentation, zipalign documentation
